entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the person who received a retort from Ron, and later used his wand to turn a knife into a paper aeroplane. He is described as someone who can think of creative ways to respond.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the person who gave a retort to Fred, and later threw a knife at him. He is described as someone who can be impulsive and act on instinct.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley enters the room just in time to see Ron throw a knife at Fred. She is described as someone who can intervene in situations and prevent harm.

entities.name: sprouts knife
entities.description: The sprouts knife is mentioned as an object that Ron throws at Fred, but it is later transformed into a paper aeroplane by Fred's wand.

relationships.description: Ron threw the sprouts knife at Fred, indicating that Ron attacked Fred. This is described in the text as 'Ron throw the sprouts knife at Fred'.

Fred used his wand to turn the knife into a paper aeroplane, indicating that he defended himself against Ron's attack. This is described in the text as 'who turned it into a paper aeroplane with one lazy flick of his wand'.

Mrs Weasley entered the room just in time to see Ron throw a knife at Fred, indicating that she intervened in the situation. This is described in the text as 'Mrs Weasley entered the room just in time'.
